Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.captureflag

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CaptureFlag
    CaptureFlag is the main class that instantiates all of the individual units that will be needed to operate the robot.
    FlagDetection  
    GameController
    This class will implement the overall game logic that will follow according to our software flowchart
    LightLocalization
    This class provides the light localization that can be used at any point to relocalize to the nearest grid intersection
    LightPoller
    This class will instantiate a poller thread and run it so that we can get data samples from the light sensor
    Navigation
    The Navigation class implements the logic of moving from one point to another, using the shortest path.
    Odometer
    This class will instantiate an odometer that will allow us to keep track of and update our robot's position and orientation using the motors' built-in tachometers
    OdometryDisplay
    This class instantiates a thread to create a UI of odometer position and orientation readings on the LCD screen of the Lego EV3 brick
    UltrasonicLocalization
    The UltrasonicLocalization class is used to orient the robot to 0 degrees.
    UltrasonicPoller
    This class will instantiate a poller thread and run it so that we can get data samples from the ultrasonic sensor
